job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: SRE @MLB has a focus on providing consulting services to any and all engineering teams throughout the organization to help in certain key areas:Incident responseKubernetes operationsUser experience optimization through SLIs and SLOsHigh Availability and Disaster recovery planningDebugging running systems and providing tools to assist runtime debuggingObservability toolingOptimizations for cost controlAs an SRE at MLB you will:Write software in python, Golang, bash, Typescript, Javascript, HCL, and maybe C/C++.Use and administer GrafanaWrite and maintain plugins for Grafana (both open source and not)Write and maintain tools that help software engineering teams function betterConsult with engineering teams in the key areas outlined aboveHelp promote good observability culture throughout MLBHelp enhance the next generation of APM toolingBe on-call for SRE managed servicesUse Google Cloud PlatformUse and understand statisticsProvide advice around HA and DR initiativesAssist teams in understanding their operational dollar cost and optimizations to reduce sameAutomate telemetry collectionA good fit for this role will:Have an eagerness to be a self-starter and get things doneHave written code in a compiled language that runs in production somewhereHave written code in interpreted languagesHave a good understanding of the JVM and JavaHave is a productHave worked with and gained a solid understanding of Grafana and its ecosystemThings you will almost certainly work on:Understanding the user experience for services run by the consulted
